name: Protöthea
description: Protöthea is a top-down scrolling shooter game with free movement that puts players in complete control of a last-generation spaceship, with the mission to destroy the asteroid called “Maqno 01,” and finish with the plans of "The Core.” Ubisoft’s Protöthea™ introduces new concepts to a beloved, classic game style while mixing genres and utilizing the full capabilities of the Nintendo Wii console from graphics to controls. Players of all ages and experience will enjoy jumping on the command of their ship, blasting through 4 different worlds in 10 challenging missions. Use your weapon arsenal and the special bonus items to help you accomplish your mission, and don't forget to slow down time and take an edge over the enemy.
